EXTRACTED VALUE: "Certain to be one of the most popular of the picture-book translations." School Library Journal
"An extraordinary work -- pure excitement." The New York Times
"This simple but important lesson is attractively illustrated in realistic watercolors." Kirkus Reviews
"Droll facial expressions, which still retain their animal quality, add more humor to a perceptive text about being different." Booklist, ALA
"Geography of the best kind made vivid by the power of imagination." Horn Book
